steam_file_persisted.htm+html.head.title: steam_file_persisted.htm+html.body.p:87-3
steam_file_persisted: With this function you can check the given file to see if it has been synchronised with the Steam Cloud. A return value of <tt>true</tt> means that it is, while <tt>false</tt> means it is not.

steam_file_persisted.htm+html.head.title: steam_file_persisted.htm+html.body.table.tbody.tr.td:99-9
steam_file_persisted: The name of the file to check.

steam_file_persisted.htm+html.head.title: steam_file_persisted.htm+html.body.p:112-3
steam_file_persisted: The above code will check to see if a file has been stored to the Steam Cloud, and if it has not it will then synchronise it.
